content: I'm driving from San Francisco to New York City, and I have about 10 days for the trip. I'd love to cycle for at least 3-4 days, and I prefer routes with low traffic and scenic views. I'm comfortable with longer distances, but I'd also like to stop at some bike shops along the way to check out local cycling scenes. By the way, I'll have my road bike, and I'm planning to bring all my bikes,l, so I'll need to find accommodations with bike storage.
